revised_title: Electronic and Vibrational Raman Spectra of PrCl3 and LaCl3
tldr: The authors conducted Raman spectroscopy experiments on PrCl3 and LaCl3 crystals to study their electronic and vibrational properties. They observed ten electronic Raman transitions in PrCl3 and determined the frequencies of five Raman-active vibrational modes in both PrCl3 and LaCl3. These findings provide valuable information for understanding the energy levels and lattice vibrations of these materials.
